mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.EQUIPMENTINTEGRITY (MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, FDESCRIPTION, STATUS) values (#{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fstarttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{precoverytime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fendtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fdescription,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select MPSNO, PROCESSNO, FSTARTTIME, PRECOVERYTIME, FENDTIME, FDESCRIPTION, STATUS from WISDOM.EQUIPMENTINTEGRITY
